27#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
28
29#include "libuutil_common.h"
30
31#include <sys/time.h>
32
33#include <errno.h>
34#include <fcntl.h>
35#include <limits.h>
36#include <stdio.h>
37#include <unistd.h>
38
39#ifdef _LP64
40#define TMPPATHFMT "%s/uu%ld"
41#else /* _LP64 */
42#define TMPPATHFMT "%s/uu%lld"
43#endif /* _LP64 */
44
45/*ARGSUSED*/
46int
47uu_open_tmp(const char *dir, uint_t uflags)
48{
49 int f;
50 char *fname = uu_zalloc(PATH_MAX);
51
52 if (fname == NULL)
53 return (-1);
54
55 for (;;) {
56 (void) snprintf(fname, PATH_MAX, "%s/uu%lld", dir,
57 (long long)gethrtime());
58
59 f = open(fname, O_CREAT | O_EXCL | O_RDWR, 0600);
60
61 if (f >= 0 || errno != EEXIST)
62 break;
63 }
64
65 if (f >= 0)
66 (void) unlink(fname);
67
68 uu_free(fname);
69
70 return (f);
71}
72
